nodes.text: Mawz Dakko was a male Gran from the planet Malastare, living during the last decades of the Galactic Republic. In 32 BBY, he worked for the Dug crimelord Sebolto, and owed the Hutts a large sum of money for hijacking spice shipments. When a bounty was placed on his head, he was killed by Jango Fett who claimed the bounty.
Mawz Dakko's bounty was 3,000 credits alive and 1,500 dead, depending on the player's decision.
